General.Name: Shenzhen Jianyi Decoration Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Jianyi Decoration Group Co., Ltd. provides interior architectural construction and design services in China. It offers services for office buildings, government agencies, star-rated hotels, cultural and educational sports sanitary buildings, transportation infrastructure buildings, residences, etc. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
